verse:
नित्यो नित्यानां चेतनश्चेतनानामेको बहूनां यो विदधाति कामान्‌।
तत्कारणं सांख्ययोगाधिगम्यं ज्ञात्वा देवं मुच्यते सर्वपाशैः॥

terms.सांख्ययोगाधिगम्यं (sāṅkhyayogādhigamyaṃ): attainable through knowledge of Sankhya and Yoga

meaning: नित्यो नित्यानां चेतनः चेतनानाम्‌।एको बहूनां यः कामान् विदधाति।तत् कारणं सांख्ययोगाधिगम्यं ज्ञात्वा।देवं सर्वपाशैः मुच्यते॥Meaning:The eternal and conscious being, who is one among the many, fulfills the desires/wishes of the eternals and conscious beings. Knowing and understanding that cause/reason, which is attainable through knowledge of Sankhya and Yoga, one is liberated/freed from all the bonds/attachments by the Divine Being/God.
